# Dial a Driver Hermanus - Development Setup

## Project Overview
A professional taxi service website for Dial a Driver Hermanus, built with React and Vite, ready for deployment on a PHP server.

## Development Steps Completed

- [x] Project scaffolding with React and Vite
- [x] Component structure setup (Header, Hero, Services, About, Booking, Contact, Footer)
- [x] Responsive CSS styling
- [x] Booking form with state management
- [x] Contact form implementation
- [x] Mobile-responsive design
- [ ] Install dependencies
- [ ] Start development server
- [ ] Test all features
- [ ] Build for production

## Next Steps

1. Install dependencies: `npm install`
2. Start dev server: `npm run dev`
3. Test the application
4. Build for production: `npm run build`
5. Deploy dist folder to PHP server
